aom.scripting.xs.ai

Class Task

  • Object
    • Task

  • public class Task
extends Object
    This class provides a collection of AI commands concerning Tasks. Tasks are low level commands that are usually only issued once. As soon as the unit receives another task it will drop the current task and never return to it again unless manually told to. This stands in contrast with plans, who also supervise the units after the task has been given and retask them if necessary.
    Author:
    Mythic_Freak - mythic.freak[a]gmail.com

      Takes the given unit, and transforms it according to the unit transform table in world.
      bool aiTaskUnitWork(int unitID, int targetUnitID)
      Does a lightweight (no plan) work tasking of the given unit on the given target unit.
